SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network

Interface VirtualServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer, SocketClientHandler, SocketServerProxy
public interface VirtualServer extends Remote
This interface is used to define the methods that the server must implement. The server is the entity that manages the game and the clients.
